item.title: Running Locally
item.description: ToC Summary Prerequisites Things you need to know Invoke a bot locally hitting an actual RStreams queue Summary This doc explains how to invoke bots running locally that hit actual queues in a deployed RStreams Bus as well as how to mock out a queue and invoke a bot with that mock data.
